name: get_job_by_task_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool midjourney_best_experience.
Tool description: Connect your project to midjourney | mj contain generate、upsample、variation...
API description: you can get the generate job  and  action job status by the task_id, and the task_id will expired at 24 hours after

task_id.description: The unique identifier for the task. This ID will expire 24 hours after its creation.
